City of Melbourne Branding

I was recently going through some old LittleSnapper screenshots from back in the day, and came across this guy. This had such a profound effect on me back then, and I still have trouble pulling my eyes away today. I love the geometric grid, the vibrant colors, and beautiful gradients. It's funny to think that this was done three years ago. Has there been a city since that's been able to rival Melbourne's modern, forward-thinking identity?

Check out Brand New's review.

Posted on December 03, 2012
